_header: With excess shake forsaked and forfaint
Title(s): My ioy is turnyd to hevynes
_description: Charles d’Orléans, ‘My ioy is turnyd to hevynes’ — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
WIth axcesse shake forsekid & forfayntThe poore karkes so
                    enfeblisshid is…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…If ye good list ye konne do well ynowIn the amverse to turne
                    all my disese
